Specimen Type: Pure clinical yeast isolates from sterile or non-sterile body sites
Purpose: To determine the susceptibility of fungal isolates to Caspofungin, guiding antifungal therapy decisions.
Container: Sterile culture tube or plate containing the viable isolate (stored at 2–8 °C)
Equipment: Incubator (35–37 °C), microtiter plates, plate reader (OD 450 nm), multichannel pipette
